languages.text: "Не хочу верить, что это сотворили верные имперские подданные, не важно, благородного происхождения или нет. Истреблять ксеносов через хитрые ловушки — дело благое. Но не своих".
"I don't want to believe that this is the work of loyal subjects of the Imperium, whether of noble birth or not. Using cunning traps to exterminate xenos is a good thing. But not killing our own."
languages.original_text: "Не хочу верить, что это сотворили верные имперские подданные, не важно, благородного происхождения или нет. Истреблять ксеносов через хитрые ловушки — дело благое. Но не своих".

traits.locale_text: "I don't want to believe that this is the work of loyal Imperial subjects, whether of noble birth or not. Using cunning traps to exterminate xenos is a good thing. But not killing our own."
"I don't want to believe that this is the work of loyal Imperial subjects, whether of noble birth or not. Using cunning traps to exterminate xenos is a good thing. But not killing our own."
"I don't want to believe that this is the work of loyal Imperial subjects, whether of noble birth or not. Using cunning traps to exterminate xenos is a good thing. But not killing our own."
"I don't want to believe that this is the work of loyal subjects of the Imperium, whether of noble birth or not. Using cunning traps to exterminate xenos is a good thing. But not killing our own."

languages.text: “我不愿意相信这是忠诚的帝国臣民所为，无论他们的出身是否高贵，我都不愿相信。设置狡猾的陷阱来消灭异形是件好事，但不该用陷阱来杀害我们的同胞。”
languages.original_text: "I don't want to believe that this is the work of loyal subjects of the Imperium, whether of noble birth or not. Using cunning traps to exterminate xenos is a good thing. But not killing our own."

traits.locale_text: “我不愿意相信这是忠诚的帝国臣民所为，无论他们的出身是否高贵，我都不愿相信。设置狡猾的陷阱来消灭异形是件好事，但不该用陷阱来杀害我们的同胞。”

languages.text: «No quiero creer que esto es obra de fieles súbditos del Imperium, sean de noble cuna o no. Usar trampas astutas para exterminar a xenos es un buen plan, pero la muerte de nuestra gente es inaceptable».
languages.original_text: "I don't want to believe that this is the work of loyal subjects of the Imperium, whether of noble birth or not. Using cunning traps to exterminate xenos is a good thing. But not killing our own."

traits.locale_text: «No quiero creer que esto es obra de fieles súbditos del Imperium, sean de noble cuna o no. Usar trampas astutas para exterminar a xenos es un buen plan, pero la muerte de nuestra gente es inaceptable».

languages.text: 「高貴な生まれかどうかにかかわらず、これが忠実な帝国臣民の仕業だとは信じたくない。異種族を根絶するために狡猾な罠を使うのは良いことだが、仲間を殺すことは許されない」
languages.original_text: "I don't want to believe that this is the work of loyal subjects of the Imperium, whether of noble birth or not. Using cunning traps to exterminate xenos is a good thing. But not killing our own."

traits.locale_text: 「高貴な生まれかどうかにかかわらず、これが忠実な帝国臣民の仕業だとは信じたくない。異種族を根絶するために狡猾な罠を使うのは良いことだが、仲間を殺すことは許されない」

languages.text: "Ich will nicht glauben, dass dies das Werk von treuen Untertanen des Imperiums ist, ob adlig oder nicht. Raffinierte Fallen, um Xenos auszulöschen, sind eine gute Sache. Aber doch nicht unsere eigenen Leute."
languages.original_text: "I don't want to believe that this is the work of loyal subjects of the Imperium, whether of noble birth or not. Using cunning traps to exterminate xenos is a good thing. But not killing our own."

traits.locale_text: "Ich will nicht glauben, dass dies das Werk von treuen Untertanen des Imperiums ist, ob adlig oder nicht. Raffinierte Fallen, um Xenos auszulöschen, sind eine gute Sache. Aber doch nicht unsere eigenen Leute."

languages.text: « Je ne veux pas croire qu'il s'agisse du travail de fidèles serviteurs de l'Imperium, qu'ils soient de haute extraction ou non. Faire appel à la ruse pour exterminer les xénos est une bonne chose. Mais certainement pas pour tuer les nôtres. »
languages.original_text: "I don't want to believe that this is the work of loyal subjects of the Imperium, whether of noble birth or not. Using cunning traps to exterminate xenos is a good thing. But not killing our own."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne veux pas croire qu'il s'agisse du travail de fidèles serviteurs de l'Imperium, qu'ils soient de haute extraction ou non. Faire appel à la ruse pour exterminer les xénos est une bonne chose. Mais certainement pas pour tuer les nôtres. »

languages.text: "Soylu veledi olsun olmasın, bunun İmparatorluk'un sadık kullarının eseri olduğuna inanmaya gönlüm el vermiyor. Zenoların kökünü kazımak üzere kurnaz tuzaklar kurmak gayet iyi. Kendi halkımızı öldürmekse başka."
languages.original_text: "I don't want to believe that this is the work of loyal subjects of the Imperium, whether of noble birth or not. Using cunning traps to exterminate xenos is a good thing. But not killing our own."
